name: Hallowed Towers
description:
Welcome to Hallowed Towers, a large-scale Tower Defense game set during the spookiest time of the year - Halloween!

Play as the legendary vampire hunter Valentin Antonescu, as he uses his weaponry, craftmanship and a bit of spooky magic powered by the Spirit of Halloween to defend the realm of Arkland from the hordes of supernatural creatures sent by the infamous Headless Horseman, and save it from being drowned in an eternal state of horror!

- Expansive Map with multiple waves of enemies

- 10 distinct Towers each with their own unique upgrade paths, up to 30 different playstyles

- A variety of weapons to help you give your enemies quite the fright!

Developed as a Final Project at Media Design School, Auckland, New Zealand.

The Team: 

Braden Cleur - Programmer / Team Leader / Game Designer 

Raghuvansh Ramesh - Art Lead / Concept Artist / Modeler / UI Artist / Animator / VFX Designer / Set Dresser

Darshan Shah - Animation Lead / VFX Lead / Concept Artist / Modeler / Lighting Artist / Technical Artist / Animator

Juan Wurz - Environment Lead / Prop Master / Level Designer / Modeler / Set Dresser / Environment Texture Artist / Animator
